HScott1 "I know many people have asked this here
created_at: but I haven't seen an answer
column3: of what happens if I decide not to tender and they get 90% of the people to tender or if they get 51%"

body: If they get 90% they can compulsory purchase the remainder at the same price. If 51% they will leave the offer on the table for another 10 days. Thereafter who knows? They may up their offer for remainder or may not
created_at: depends how badly they want them and how reluctant the sellers are????
